name: Fire Safety Training
description:
Fire Safety Training is a first-person serious game intended to teach IT workers how to identify and use fire extinguishers common to an office environment. The software is provided "as is" and no warranty is implied.

This Fire Safety Training prototype was developed by:

Steven Benson, jkelly, KLewis, Kristofer Stevenson

Minimum system requirements

Operating System: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher

CPU: Intel Core i3-4170 or better

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or better

HDD: 200 MB free space

RAM: 4 GB

VRAM: 2 GB
